key_insight: Most HVAC equipment is certified based on testing 1-3 units in a single lab. PermaFrost NMR has 6 independent labs, 254 field measurements + 61 academic tests, 125 PE-certified field studies, 3 US Government/Military installations, and UL-verified testing methodology spanning 15 years. This exceeds the testing rigor of virtually any HVAC product, chemical, or technology on the market.
